```sql
SELECT
t1.`CATEGORY`,
t1.`CITY`,
t1.`COUNTRY`,
t1.`CREATE_MAN`,
t1.`CREATE_TIME`,
t1.`EMAIL`,
t1.`EMAIL_OPT_OUT`,
t1.`GL_ACCOUNT`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`LOCKED__S`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`OWNER`,
t1.`PHONE`,
t1.`RECORD_LMAGE`,
t1.`STATE`,
t1.`STREET`,
t1.`TAG`,
t1.`UNSUBSCRIBED_MODE`,
t1.`UNSUBSCRIBED_TIME`,
t1.`UPDATE_MAN`,
t1.`UPDATE_TIME`,
t1.`VENDOR_NAME`,
t1.`WEBSITE`,
t1.`ZIP_CODE`
FROM `VENDOR` t1 


```
